title: 6: The Happy Hour Episode
itunes:title: The Happy Hour Episode
description: It’s 5 o’clock somewhere... TIME FOR HAPPY HOUR! In this episode, Lisa shows you how to cut the calories at the bar and shares her 2-ingredient party food hacks! Plus, the gang reviews low-calorie mixers, shares some serious shockers, and more. Let the party begin!
